com.kloudtek.systyrant.annotation

Annotation Type Resources


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface Resources

    This annotation is used to inject other resources (retrieving using the query specified in value()) from the context into a Resource's field.

    The annotated field must be in a STResource annotated class.

    The annotated field's class type must be either of:

    • a STResource object (in which case it will expect only one valid resource to be found, and will fail if that is not the case)
    • an array of STResource objects
    • a Collection of STResource objects
    • a List of STResource objects
    • a Set of STResource objects

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String value
      Query used to retrieve resources to inject.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract java.lang.String value
        Query used to retrieve resources to inject.
        Returns:
        Query string.
        See Also:
        ResourceQuery
